attributes.additional_details:
Ladies and Gents, both myself and Amanda sat with Youth Workers to establish a partnership  to save the Youth Centre and get our services established at the centre.

The youth service will cease from December 31st but the building may be available to us through various streams.
Please don't let it be turned into houses or a car park.

We want to use this opportunity to strengthen existing youth services with a provision for younger children and families, turning the youth centre into a family hub.

Biddulph is losing so many of its services, if we can use this petition to strengthen our expression of interest in the building we can hopefully influence local government to help us create a brand new service. A self funded project with no reliance on council budgets.

Please sign this petition to show your support for our project and as an indication of the need for such a service in Biddulph.

Thank you for your continued support as always.
